name: Mini Cart Free Shipping Bar
headline: The Mini Cart Free Shipping Bar is a MiniCart.v2 component that adds a progress bar to the minicart in order to display how much progress a customer has to win free shipping.
overview: This block is only a visual guide, meaning it will not make any calculation or deduct the shipping amount from your store. You should pair this app with a Free Shipping Promotion of the same amount The amount value, can be edited inside the App Settings.
features: Display how much progress a customer has to win free shipping
Compatible with 5 different languages including: English, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese and Romanian.
